cli_help.details:
Terragon ADO v4.0 - Autonomous Development Orchestrator
============================================================

Commands:
  init       Initialize ADO in current directory
  run        Execute autonomous backlog processing
  status     Show current backlog status
  discover   Discover new backlog items from code
  validate   Validate environment and configuration
  metrics    Show performance and execution metrics
  help       Show this help message

Environment Variables:
  GITHUB_TOKEN    - GitHub Personal Access Token (required)
  OPENAI_API_KEY  - OpenAI API key for LLM agents (required)
  ADO_LOG_LEVEL   - Logging level (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR)
  ADO_CONFIG_PATH - Custom configuration file path

Files & Directories:
  backlog.yml       - Main backlog configuration
  backlog/*.json    - Individual backlog items
  docs/status/      - Execution reports and metrics
  escalations/      - Human intervention logs

Examples:
  ado init          # Setup new project
  ado validate      # Check environment
  ado run           # Start autonomous execution
  ado status        # View backlog status
  ado metrics       # View performance data
